snack.name: Snack
snack.flavor: Organic, locally-sourced zombie-killing fuel in eco-friendly packaging.

energydrink.name: Energy Drink
energydrink.flavor: It's got Electrolytes. It's what plants crave.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.description: Roll First Aid. Restore health equal to x2 of your roll.
bandage.flavor: It's even got a dinosaur on it!

firstaidkit.name: First Aid Kit
firstaidkit.description: Roll First Aid. Restore health equal to x5 of your roll.
firstaidkit.flavor: Good for keeping you not dead.

medkit.name: Med Kit
medkit.description: Roll First Aid. Restore health equal to x10 of your roll.

ammo.name: Reload
ammo.description: Choose one ammo type. Gain 1d30 of that ammo with a minimum of 10

backpack.name: Fanny Pack
backpack.description: Increase available inventory slots by 1. Delete this after use.

belt.name: Utility Belt
belt.description: Increase your available equipment slots by 1 (Up to a maximum of 6 equipment slots). Delete this after use.

barricade.name: Sandbags!
barricade.description: Roll Construction. Build a barricade anywhere with health equal to 5x your roll. Delete this after use.
barricade.flavor: Made with really, really lightweight sand.

armor1.name: Duct Tape Armguard
armor1.flavor: Enough Duct Tape can do just about anything.

armor2.name: Sporting Guards
armor2.flavor: Perfect for doing that sport with the sporting ball.

armor4.name: Plate Armor
armor4.flavor: Time to get medieval on their ass.

grenade.name: Grenade
grenade.description: Damage is dealt to all adjacent squares.
grenade.flavor: Just a casual fragmentation grenade lying around.

sharp1.name: Knife
sharp1.flavor: Great for cutting vegetables, fruit, and brains.

sharp2.name: Machete
sharp2.flavor: Great tool for re-deading the undead.

sharp4.name: Katana
sharp4.flavor: Forgive me sensei, I must go all out. Just this once.

sharp5.name: Chainsaw
sharp5.flavor: It's about to be a massacre.

blunt1.name: Baseball Bat
blunt1.flavor: It is now past the time... for America's favorite pastime.

blunt2.name: Truncheon
blunt2.flavor: Not to be mistaken for a luncheon.

blunt3.name: Nailbat
blunt3.flavor: Peanut Butter and Jelly. Burger and Fries. Ham and Cheese. Nails and a Bat.

blunt5.name: Lawnmower
blunt5.description: The turn you use this, you attack as you move, dealing damage to each square you move through

bow1.name: Bow
bow1.description: If you hit your target, leave a marker at the target. You can regain any spent arrows this turn.

bow2.name: Compound Bow
bow2.description: If you hit your target, leave a marker at the target. You can regain any spent arrows this turn.
bow2.flavor: How do you like them apples?
